title: I just got someone mad at me...
body:
For saying 'gg wp' at the end of a game. I dunno if they were offended because they didn't feel it was a gg (it was a 16 min stomp, they had afks), or if they thought I was saying that I played well (First game as Jhin. It was weird.)

Seriously, wtf?

replies.body:
I am curious if you make contentious comments just to cause arguments or if you actually have this many problems with the current game. Because going through your comment/discussion history shows a LOT of arguments with people, and 90% of it is because you said something is just stupid or broken or strickly worse or unfair or undeserved or some other complaint against riot. 

So either I ask you- why do you like pissing people off so much 
or
Why do you still play this game?
